title: 5 Years Late To U.S. Cannabis
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Red White and Bloom CEO Brad Rogers talks aggressive strategy after being 5 years late to the cannabis game. Establishing presence in the US with strong brands in compelling states. Canadian players without a US strategy will be left behind. US MSOs building formidable moat. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
